CustomField.formula:
If(ISNULL( Date_Closed__c ),
(today() - datevalue(CreatedDate) - 2*( floor((today() - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor((datevalue(CreatedDate) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7))),
(datevalue(Date_Closed__c ) - datevalue(CreatedDate) - 2*( floor((datevalue(Date_Closed__c ) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor((datevalue(CreatedDate) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7))))
CustomField.label: Case Days Excluding Weekends
